actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT Date_trunc('year', view_date)	AS timestamp, 
sum(cast(total_video_views as decimal)) as COUNT_Prevyearmonth
FROM public."smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view"
where view_date >= '{{moment().add(-1, 'year').format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
  		AND view_date < '{{moment().add(-1, 'year').format("YYYY-MM-31")}}':: date
			AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
			GROUP BY timestamp
order by timestamp desc
limit 1;
